title: Two-wheeler sales surge in festive season: Hero MotoCorp leads with 26.4% growth
description: In the midst of the ongoing festive season, the Indian market witnessed a robust double-digit increase in motorcycle and scooter sales last month, reflecting improved consumer sentiments. Hero MotoCorp, the market leader, reported a substantial growth of 26.4%, selling over half a million units domestically. Rival companies such as Honda Motorcycle and Scooter India, TVS Motor Company, and Bajaj Auto also experienced significant sales upticks.
